sub_title: Commercial Director at OTFLOW - an innovative technology reducing food waste, increasing sustainability and decreasing financial losses.
summary:
My experience in sales-, marketing-, product- and business development includes a more than fifteen years association with a couple of companies active in different b2b and b2c sectors (media, trading, tourism, aviation, maritime field, education, pvc/pp/pe for construction, building materials, machinery, security and technology) where I was in charge of various territories at different levels such as managing/coaching teams, new/existing key-accounts, facilitating suppliers and resellers/distributors in their needs, purchase, export, branding, advertising, pioneering, organizing events and trade shows.

I am result-oriented and energetic with attention to details and a hands-on mentality who enjoys to be challenged in creativity and entrepreneurship. A self-starter and team player who likes working in an international environment.  I routinely traverse the globe.

I studied International Business and Languages with a specialization Latin American Studies. I lived and worked abroad (Belgium, Brazil, Holland, Paraguay and Spain). I am especially familiar with commercial activities in Europe and Latin America.

education.field_of_study: International Business & Languages - Latin American Studies (IBL LAS)

profile_positions.description:
The Verder Group has been operating for more than 60 years offering innovative technologies and has two main divisions:

- The Scientific division offering high tech laboratory and analytical equipment 
- The Liquids division offering an extensive range of positive displacement pumps and mixing solutions 

With more than 40 wholly owned trading and production companies worldwide, the Verder Group is represented on four continents.  In addition to our wholly owned distribution network, Verder products are sold through a network of independent distributors in a wide range of countries worldwide.

Since its origin in 1959, the Verder Group has experienced a continuous growth and today employs over 1750 people with an annual turnover of more than 340 million Euros.  The Verder group is wholly owned and managed by the founding family.

Verder Liquids division is a supplier  of an extensive range of positive displacement pumps. Verder pumps are able to transfer all kinds of liquids in many industries such as chemical industry, process industry, food, pharmaceutical industry, and water treatment. The products of Verder are acknowledged as innovative and extremely reliable. Having a full range of pump principles available, each Verder affiliate is able to serve the best pump solution for each specific customer application. Therefore our sales engineers excel in knowledge of customer processes and understanding the abilities of the different type of pumps. At Verder we put all energy and attention on improving the quality and performance of our pumps and service. We do so with energy, dedication and - most importantly- with our heart: Passion for Pumps.

Verder delivers a complete range of pump solutions; the right solutions for every pump challenge.

www.verderliquids.com
www.verder.com

Responsibilities: sales-, business development, event organisation, ambassador, managing distribution network. An entrepreneurial and pioneering role. I routinely traverse the globe.
profile_positions.title: Regional Export Sales Manager Southern Europe, Latin America & Africa

profile_positions.description:
Nyloplast Europe B.V. is an organization giving air to fresh ideas and making a difference in the plastic sector. Bringing easiness and safety in daily life. 

Adopts a flexible approach in meeting its customers' wishes and requirements. They team up with their customers, frequently coming up with new ideas that are materialized into sustainable PVC products. Due to their Thermo Moulding technology they are able to manufacture a wide range of custom-made-solutions for non-pressure underground / street level pipe systems, drainage and air transportation in a large number of countries.

Out of plastic pipes and sheets the company manufactures various non-standard products in all possible shapes and diameters, including junctions, reducers, couplers, bends, inspection chambers, gullies and concrete connectors. 

Clients and partners are primarily local PVC/PP/PE/concrete pipe system producers, wholesalers, distributors and dealers with also interest and focus on organizations involved in storm water management, soil and waste water management, greenhouses - horticulture, construction / infrastructure (outside environment) and local authorities / embassies. 

Together with their sister companies Dyka and BT Bautechnik they offer a complete range of PVC, PP and PE solutions.

Think. Shape. Connect.
Nyloplast! - www.nyloplast.nl
Member of Tessenderlo Group - www.tessenderlo.com

Responsibilities: sales-, marketing-, business development. An entrepreneurial and pioneering role in Southern Europe and Latin America. I routinely traversed the globe.
profile_positions.title: Regional Director Southern Europe & Latin America

volunteer_experiences.description:
After many hardworking training sessions of 6 months I participated in running the Marathon of Rotterdam (The Netherlands) on Sunday the 5th of April 2009.

Next to my personal goals I also decided to participate in this run for a charity fund. In the summer of 2008 I was touched by the work of Juconi - www.juconi.nl; Foundation of Hope for homeless children in Latin America. The story about the lives of these homeless children and the charity work of Juconi has convinced me to participate into this fantastic challenge! 

In order to be succesfull and to gather as much financial support as possible I have posted a video of my 'mini-marketing-campaign' on YouTube (copy / paste the following link in your browser): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yLSudOJCjx8

More media:

http://www.inholland.nl/content/news/nieuws2009/200904/oud-student%20loopt%20marathon%20voor%20goed%20doel.htm
